column5: Upscale 1 bedroom apartment w/ kitchen, bathroom, living area private entrance & private yard. Fully furnished/or unfurnished (upon request) Approximately 1100sqft this guest home features granite countertops, large skylight, private bathroom with shower, closet for storage, and all new updated appliances. Bed sheets, towels & dishes provided. Centrally located in the middle of town for convenient access to local restaurants, grocery, and shopping. Must have owners approval for all pets!
